{{codepointer|Doom|Monster AI}}'''A_Metal''' {{doomwiki|A_Metal}}
(no parameters)
Plays the sound "spider/walk" and calls [[A_Chase]].
== Examples == This example is taken from Doom's [[Classes:Cyberdemon|Cyberdemon]].
See: CYBR A 3 [[A_Hoof]] CYBR ABBCC 3 [[A_Chase]] CYBR D 3 [[A_Metal]] CYBR D 3 loop
